item.title: Epstein files: DOJ begins releasing documents
item.description: The DOJ has begun publicly releasing what an official said Friday would be "several hundred thousand" documents from its Epstein files.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Deaf Santa delivers hope to hard of hearing children for the holidays
item.description: Charles Graves, also known as Deaf Santa, shows his journey of bringing Christmas magic in the new documentary, 'Deaf Santa Claus.'
